text.title: Convicted murderer J.C.X. Simon dies in prison, aged 69
text.head: Convicted murderer J.C.X. Simon dies in prison, aged 69
Sources

list.item: Jillian Sederholm. "'Zebra Killer' J.C.X. Simon Found Dead in Prison Cell" — NBC News , March 14, 2015
Lee Romney. "'Zebra Killer' J.C.X. Simon found dead in San Quentin prison cell" — Los Angeles Times , March 13, 2015
"'Zebra killer' inmate JCX Simon found dead in San Quentin prison cell" — San Jose Mercury News , March 13, 2015
